newsitem.title: FINLAND: FINNISH SOP SETS OCT 21 PULP BENCHMARK AT $565.50.
newsitem.headline: FINNISH SOP SETS OCT 21 PULP BENCHMARK AT $565.50.

text.p: Suomen Optioporssi (SOP), a Finnish options exchange, on Monday put the value of northern bleached softwood pulp at $565.50 per tonne, down from $568.26 last week. Information for calculation of the benchmark pulp price is supplied by more than 30 companies from 11 different countries, SOP says.
The benchmark Pulp Indicator Index (PIX) is released by SOP every Monday. In September, the PIX mean was $562.13, the exchange said.
SOP is calculating the PIX with the intention of starting trading in pulp derivatives.
It has said trading will start as soon as it has received a sufficient number of clearing accounts, possibly in December.
